title: Introducing atmux: A Tmux Companion for Agentic Coding in Projects
description: atmux: project-scoped tmux sessions, fast resume workflows, and a browse/send interface built for real coding loops.

title: 2026 Youth Media Award Winners: Covers, Links, and Quick Descriptions
description: A book-by-book roundup of the 2026 ALA Youth Media Award winners with covers, bookstore/library links, and quick blurbs.
